summary: Forced to work together, two event planners learn that opposites can produce the most unexpected results.
cast: Danica McKellar|Paul Greene|Graham Verchere|Elise Gatien|Anthony Konechny|Linda Gray|Nelson Wong|Nicole Shorrock|D. Harlan Cutshall|Conchita Campbell|Marco Soriano|Meghan Gardiner|Natalie von Rotsburg|Victoria Katongo|Romuald Hivert|Dee Jay Jackson|Beverley Breuer|Ian Hawkins|Erica Tremblay|Kevin|Robin Givens|John Specogna|Draco McKellar Verta
title: La boda perfecta
